eu.semagrow.core.impl.planner

Class DecomposerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.semagrow.core.impl.planner.DecomposerContext

  • public class DecomposerContext
extends Object
    Decomposer Context

    Holds solution modifiers (such as LIMIT) and FILTER statements that form the context within which query decomposition operates.

    Author:
    Angelos Charalambidis, Stasinos Konstantopoulos

      • getLimit

        public long getLimit()
        Gets the value of the LIMIT modifier
        Returns:
        long the value of the LIMIT modifier, if any; -2 if there is no LIMIT modifier; -1 if the LIMIT modifier overflows long

      • hasLimit

        Checks if the query has a LIMIT modifier
        Returns:
